div.p:
Appleâ€™s engineering team focusing on autonomous technology is looking for a System Integration Test Engineer for the Hardware Integration Test Team.
The team commissions and tests system level hardware/software functions spanning numerous different technology disciplines.

ul.li: To succeed within this role, you should have solid experience in several of the following areas:
A genuine passion for diagnosing hardware, software, and process issues
Strong EE fundamentals in analog/digital design, communications, sensors, power, embedded systems, etc.
Demonstrated critical thinking on system designs, ability to identify potential risk areas
Familiar with OS tools, shell scripting, file system manipulation and process management
Ability to quickly bridge core engineering knowledge into new technology disciplines
Excellent Communication skills, role will require close cooperation with multiple design teams

div.p: Comprehensive analysis of the System EE design, development of systematic methods for definition of tests, and continuous assessment of tests coverage Collaboration with hardware and software design teams to develop test/validation goals and objectives Definition of test setups, identification and construction of specialized test environments to support system commissioning and testing Commissioning of system level hardware/software functions spanning numerous different technology disciplines. Support sub-system teams for troubleshooting system level issues Automation of systematic tasks: system design analysis, database queries, execution of tests, operation of test equipment Development of new testing systems to support new technology development Definition and execution of test runs, results processing, archiving and reporting Regular communication of system maturity and validation status to leadership
BS or MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering or equivalent required
